
Changelog
=========

0.4.0 (2018-7-08)
-----------------------------------------

* composer: added/fixed column tonerow support

0.3.0 (2018-7-04)
-----------------------------------------

* cli: added random melody generator command

0.2.1 (2016-8-27)
-----------------------------------------

* build: added `miditime` to setup install requirements

0.2.0 (2016-8-27)
-----------------------------------------

* composer: Added save to MIDI capability

0.1.0 (2016-8-20)
-----------------------------------------

* First release on PyPI.
